expo.name: metro-md-restore
expo.description: An app for bargain hunters and builders to find great deals on gently used furniture and other housing goods

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera allows admins to take pictures to add new items to the store.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to allow admins to upload pictures of new items to the store.
